definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: When the snow melts, the mountain stream becomes a deluge.
sentences.chinese: 雪融化時，山間溪流變成山洪暴發。

sentences.english: Sometimes mountain torrents swept down, flooding the fields.
sentences.chinese: 有時山洪暴發，淹沒農田。

sentences.english: Edward was drifted to an isolated island.
sentences.chinese: 山洪從山上流下來，愛德華被衝到一個孤島。

sentences.english: The downpour triggered floods and mudslides along the Bailong River in Zhouqu County.
sentences.chinese: 降雨在白龍江沿岸再次引發山洪和泥石流。

sentences.english: The types of flooding were river torrents and mountain torrents.
sentences.chinese: 水災類型以江洪災爲主，山洪爲次之。

sentences.english: The torrential flood annihilated the village.
At least five other people were killed in flash floods in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 另有至少五人在首爾的山洪暴發中身亡。

sentences.english: Else, Torrent Drive users have to keep retrying to start the torrent.
sentences.chinese: 否則，山洪驅動器的用戶必須保持重試，開始洪流。
土耳其山洪爆發，31人死亡。

sentences.english: I understand that flash flooding is not able to be controlled.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，山洪暴發，是不能夠被控制。

sentences.english: Sudden rainstorms would bring the mountain torrents rushing down.
sentences.chinese: 突然的暴雨會使山洪暴發。

sentences.english: When he saw the mountain torrents rushing down with a devastating force, he was consternated.
sentences.chinese: 看到山洪來勢兇猛時，他驚慌失色。

sentences.english: Being besieged by mountain torrents, how many people still engrave those forests being peremptorily cut down?
sentences.chinese: 被山洪圍困的人，有多少還銘記橫遭砍伐的森林？

sentences.english: Heavy rains triggered flash floods in Fangshan, Juma River flood peak discharge.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨引發山洪暴發，在房山拒馬河洪峯流量。

sentences.english: Meteorological department warned that heavy rain has caused flash flooding hazard.
sentences.chinese: 氣象部門警告說，暴雨有引起山洪暴發的危險。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
